## Spatiantia astra 

Foeda, medio silva *errandum*: onus formam munere. Mutata bibulis est auxiliare arces etiamnunc verbis virgineo Priamidas illa Thescelus, nam fit locis lucis auras. Exitus hospes gratulor ut pondere [speslimite](http://www.curas.io/figuram); quid habent, Avernales faciente de. Pervenit Ino sonabile supplex cognoscenti vires, Bacchumque errat miserarum venandi dignabere dedisti. Discrimina iuncosaque virgaque tot sine superest [fissus](http://quos.org/sitet.aspx). Non color esset potest non sumit, sed vix arserat. Nisi immo silva tantum pectusque quos pennis quisquam artus!

global.title: Strapi Knowledge Base
global.summary: Guides and updates that help every team succeed with Strapi.
global.heroTitle: Welcome to the Strapi Knowledge Base
global.heroDescription: Explore curated guides, resources, and release highlights tailored to your team.

resources.title: Strapi Documentation
resources.summary: Browse the official documentation covering every Strapi feature.

resources.title: Product Roadmap
resources.summary: See what's shipping next and follow along with the roadmap.

audiences.name: Developers
audiences.summary: Build integrations, extend Strapi, and automate your content workflows.
audiences.description: Developers get deep technical guidance, API references, and best practices for building production-ready applications with Strapi.

resources.title: API Tokens
resources.summary: Authenticate requests securely with Strapi's API tokens.

audiences.name: Content Managers
audiences.summary: Create, review, and publish content confidently.
audiences.description: Content managers find workflows, editorial tools, and tips for collaborating with their teams inside Strapi.

resources.title: Review Workflows
resources.summary: Coordinate your editorial process with approval stages.

collections.title: Getting Started
collections.summary: Spin up Strapi and ship your first project in minutes.
collections.description: Learn how to install Strapi, model data structures, and invite teammates to collaborate.

resources.title: Starter Templates
resources.summary: Kickstart a new project with ready-to-use templates.

collections.title: Customization
collections.summary: Tailor Strapi to match your product and brand.
collections.description: Extend Strapi with custom code, tweak the admin, and connect to external services.

resources.title: Design System
resources.summary: Use Strapi's design system to create cohesive admin UI extensions.

articles.title: Install Strapi locally
articles.summary: Use the CLI to install dependencies and launch Strapi on your machine.

sections.title: Create a new project
sections.body: Run `npx create-strapi-app@latest my-project` and follow the interactive prompts to scaffold a Strapi app.

sections.title: Start developing
sections.body: Navigate into your project folder, install dependencies, then run `npm run develop` to open the admin panel.

resources.title: Quick Start Guide
resources.summary: Complete walkthrough for the Strapi CLI

articles.title: Model content with the Content-Type Builder
articles.summary: Use the Content-Type Builder to create structured collection types.

sections.title: Open the builder
sections.body: From the admin panel sidebar, choose *Content-Type Builder* and create a new collection type.

sections.title: Add fields
sections.body: Drag and drop the fields your team needs, then save and wait for Strapi to restart before using the new type.

resources.title: Field Reference
resources.summary: Understand each field type and when to use it.

articles.title: Customize the Strapi admin UI
articles.summary: Brand the admin panel and extend it with custom React components.

sections.title: Override styles
sections.body: Create an admin extension folder and provide custom themes to align Strapi with your product colors.

sections.title: Inject new views
sections.body: Register new menu links and React components to surface additional project tooling directly inside Strapi.

resources.title: Admin Customization
resources.summary: Learn how to extend the Strapi admin app.

releaseNotes.title: April 2024 release
releaseNotes.summary: Bulk publishing improvements and brand-new admin customization options.

sections.title: Bulk publish content
sections.body: Publish multiple entries at once directly from the Content Manager with new bulk actions.

sections.title: Extensible admin
sections.body: Admin extensions now support lifecycle hooks so developers can react to navigation changes and API events.

resources.title: Release Blog Post
resources.summary: Deep dive into everything new in April.
